articles.title: Coronavirus latest news: Donald Trump experiencing 'mild symptoms' after testing positive for coronavirus - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: President Donald Trump is experiencing "mild symptoms" of Covid-19 after revealing that he and his wife had tested positive, White House Chief of Staff Mark Meadows has confirmed.
articles.content:
Since March, Mr Trump has taken a relaxed approach to the pandemic - so it may come as no shock that this translated to his staff.
The first set face masks were delivered to the White House in Febru… [+1185 chars]

articles.title: Covid: Northumbria University confirms 770 cases among students - BBC News
articles.description: Northumbria University in Newcastle says 770 students have tested positive and are now isolating.
articles.content:
